manual.description: Manually configure (select or create) the resource group and storage account. Default - false: creates a resource group and storage account with arbitrary names.

subscriptionName.description: subscription ID under which to create new resources

resourceGroup.description: name of the Azure Resource Group to deploy to.

account.description: name of the Azure Storage Account to deploy to.

location.description: location where to create storage account e.g. "West US"

resource-allocation.description: When false, don't validate against Azure (no login needed). Only add the needed configuration in angular.json and azure.json.

config.description: When false, don't configure Azure resources (no login needed). Only add the needed configuration in angular.json.

dry.description: Don't validate or change any files. Only output what would be the change in the project.
